title: Not gunna lie..
body:
Sat here for like 2 minutes completely befuddled as to why there were 2 Xeraths in my game...

Damn splash art mind-game strats!

replies.body:
I smoke (outside) during loading screens, never notice this stuff.

Made me laugh, thanks.
Thats the reason i like that galio skin.
So within those 2 minutes you never looked down at the names?

You know that daze you go into when in non-ranked loading screens..
You're just kinda dead to the world for a while only able to recognise simple shapes and colours.
